src:
Falso que se vayan a condonar multas a partidos, solo se aprobó reducir financiamiento en un 50%: Delgado | Video
 by Redacción AN / JM



El coordinador de Morena en la Cámara de Diputados, Mario Delgado, dijo que “es absolutamente falso” que se pretenda condonar multas a los partidos políticos y anotó que el dictamen aprobado en comisiones sólo prevé la reducción del financiamiento de los institutos políticos en un 50%.
text:
False that fines are going to be condoned to parties, it was only approved to reduce financing by 50%: Slim | Video
 by AN / JM Writing



The coordinator of Morena in the Chamber of Deputies, Mario Delgado, said that "it is absolutely false" that it is intended to condone fines to political parties and noted that the opinion approved in commissions only provides for the reduction of financing of political institutes by 50 %.
